definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Sense only the "maleficent contacts" and shut them out.
sentences.chinese: 只感知“有害接触”并拒之门外。

sentences.english: The team found the sense of ownership still occurred when participants' fingers were anaesthetized.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员发现当受试者的手指被麻醉时，仍有感知。

sentences.english: They help to open man's perception and expand his approaches to creativity.
sentences.chinese: 他们能够帮助解放人的感知力，拓展人的创造能力。

sentences.english: Your emotions are a response to your perception.
sentences.chinese: 你的情感是感知力的回应。

sentences.english: John Metta of positorio.us said "location-aware networking.
sentences.chinese: us的约翰迈特说“位置感知网络。

sentences.english: And all the chores are traveling can make our perception of it.
sentences.chinese: 而一切纷扰的凡尘琐事都能使我们感知它的意义。

sentences.english: Thus, neurophysiologists tell us that lobsters do not process pain.
sentences.chinese: 但是，神经生理学家告诉我们龙虾感知不到疼痛。

sentences.english: I think animals can sense disaster.They have a sixth sense.
sentences.chinese: 我想动物通常能感知大灾难的来临，它们有第六感。

sentences.english: Because nobody might perceive his or her beauty.
sentences.chinese: 因为没人可以感知他或她的美。

sentences.english: Gaudí also had a sense of proportion.
sentences.chinese: 高迪对比例的感知很好。

sentences.english: But how the human body is able to sense a one-degree change in temperature has remained a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 但人体如何感知一度的温度变化仍是个谜。

sentences.english: Mapping the filtered MFCC to loudness the process of human perception is simulated.
sentences.chinese: 将滤波后的参数映射为响度，由此模拟人的感知过程。

sentences.english: Know how deep your crankbait is running with the rod and reel setup you're using.
sentences.chinese: 通过的你竿子和轮子来感知crank下潜的深度。

sentences.english: So our mental body maps seem to reflect our ability to feel.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们的心理和身体地图似乎反映着我们的感知力。

sentences.english: He is also the cause of our perceiving what we do .
sentences.chinese: 同时他也造就了我们的感知。

definition: to find out/to ascertain/to get an idea of
